alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 4:30PM MST until July 31 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 430 PM MST, Gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Cruff Wash. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding may be occurring where the wash crosses Agua Caliente Road. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Maricopa County This includes the following streams and drainages... Cruff Wash, Loudermilk Wash, Woolsey Wash, Fourth of July Wash, Yellow Medicine Wash, Arlington Canal, Gila River, Enterprise Canal, Centennial Wash and Quail Wash. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
